name: Call of Duty Game Script
summary: Learn about .GSC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GSC files are sometimes modified ("modded") by the game community to create custom content. However, this can result in banning from CoD servers if detected.

description: File used by Call of Duty (CoD) games, including Modern Warfare 2 (MW2), MW3, MW4, and MW5; saved in a plain text format and may contain gameplay settings for maps, graphics, audio, and other gameplay properties often used for describing game maps.
